title: Unit Circle $$1$$
text: The value inside the parenthesis of the sin refers to an angle which also corresponds to a point on the unit circle.

title: Unit Circle $$2$$
text: The angle $$\frac{π}{6}$$ corresponds to the point $$(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2},\frac{1}{2})$$ on the unit circle.

title: Definition of trigonometric functions
text: Letting 𝜃 be an angle, csc𝜃 $$=$$ $$\frac{1}{y}$$, sec𝜃 $$=$$ $$\frac{1}{x}$$, and cot𝜃 $$=$$ $$\frac{x}{y}$$.

title: Combining
text: Based on the above information, what is the value of sec𝜃 at the angle $$\frac{π}{6}$$.
